title: SSSR schedules community meeting for January 31
excerpt: Save the Scenic Santa Ritas has scheduled a community meeting to discuss the impact of the proposed Copper World mine.
body: SSSR will host a community meeting to review recent developments and outline the next steps in the permitting process.
Residents can learn more about how groundwater use, dust, and truck traffic could affect nearby neighborhoods.
Please share the event with friends and neighbors who care about the Santa Rita Mountains.
